name: Teracats
description:
Teracats is a simple local two-player game for killing 20 minutes. Beat the opponent with your missile gun! 

We used the following tools, libraries, and assets, for the game. They increased our development speed a lot!

  • Tiled Map Editor
  • aseprite
  • Particle2dx For EffectHub
  • SDL
  • yaml-cpp
  • Retro Game
  • PeriTune
  • M+ Fonts
Controls

Player 1

  • Move: A/D
  • Jump: W
  • Shoot downward: V
  • Shoot upward: B

Player 2

  • Move: Left/Right
  • Jump: Up
  • Shoot downward: N
  • Shoot upward: M

You can move the aim by holding the shoot button.

Toggle fullscreen: Alt+F4
